channel.title: Walk to item before picking it up
channel.description:
I was wondering, how did you do that? I mean, you click an item, it walks to it, and it picks it up. Not like you walk there and have to click it AGAIN and it will pick it up. I had found a tut long time agoi, but i los it /cry....... Sad Sad Sad Sad Sad Sad Sad
So anyone can help me?
Also, how do you make it so that you walk to an object before you perform the action?
thanks

item.title: Walk to item before picking it up
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Theres a reason for the GoodDistance void hint hint

Read full topic

item.title: Walk to item before picking it up
item.dc:creator: @Lnss12 Lnss12
item.description:
@Lnss12 wrote:

right click instead, it will bring up a menu with what u can do from there, ie. open walk here etc.
